content:
# The stone furnace is still operational and has produced a total of 24 iron plates while consuming 12 coal. It currently has 4 iron ore remaining to smelt.
# 
# With 24 iron plates in my inventory, I now have more than enough to craft the Assembling Machine. However, I still need to craft the Iron Gear Wheels first, as they are required for the Assembling Machine.
# 
# Since I have already smelted enough iron plates, I will now proceed to craft the Iron Gear Wheels again. I will craft 5 Iron Gear Wheels, which will consume 5 iron plates.

craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=5)  # Crafting 5 Iron Gear Wheels.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking updated inventory after crafting.
